caption.p: For choline: 6LU7 complex: (a) Variation of Coulombic interaction energy and Lenard Jones interaction energy with respect to time (attached with color contour representation with specific color coding), (b) Relation between Energy in vacuum, Polar solvation energy, Nonpolar solvation energy, (c). Variation of total Free binding energy with respect to full time trajectory (0–10,000 ps).
